recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.instructions:
1. Finely chop the onion, garlic, carrot, and celery. Grate cheese and set aside.
2. Heat olive oil in a pan. Sauté onions 2–3 mins. Add garlic, carrot, celery. Cook 2–3 mins.
3. Add beef, break it apart, and cook until browned (6–8 mins). Season with salt and pepper.
4. Stir in tomato paste, canned tomatoes, oregano, basil. Simmer 15–20 mins uncovered. Stir occasionally.
5. Boil water and cook spaghetti as per instructions. Drain and set aside.
6. Serve spaghetti with sauce. Top with parmesan and basil if desired.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken with curry powder, garlic, onion, tomato, and yogurt. Simmer until tender.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.instructions: Mix flour, milk, egg, and sugar. Fry on pan until golden brown on both sides.

recipes.title: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.instructions: Cook beef and mushrooms with garlic, onion, and sour cream. Serve over noodles or rice.

recipes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.instructions: Butter bread, add cheese, and toast on a pan until golden and melted.

recipes.title: Tom Yum Soup
recipes.instructions: Boil shrimp with lemongrass, galangal, chili, and lime juice. Add mushrooms and fish sauce.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.instructions: Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, chicken, and parmesan.

recipes.title: Egg Fried Rice
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry rice with egg, soy sauce, garlic, and spring onion.

recipes.title: Ramen
recipes.instructions: Boil noodles in broth, add pork, egg, miso, and toppings like nori and spring onion.

recipes.title: Miso Soup
recipes.instructions: Boil water with miso paste. Add tofu, seaweed, and spring onion.

recipes.title: Pad Thai
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry noodles with shrimp, egg, garlic, bean sprouts, and tamarind. Top with peanuts.

recipes.title: Mac & Cheese
recipes.instructions: Boil macaroni. Mix with cheese sauce made from milk, cheddar, butter, and flour.

recipes.title: Lasagna
recipes.instructions: Layer lasagna sheets with beef, tomato sauce, ricotta, and cheese. Bake until golden.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cake
recipes.instructions: Mix flour, cocoa, sugar, butter, and eggs. Bake and let cool before serving.

recipes.title: Sushi Rolls
recipes.instructions: Spread sushi rice on nori, add fillings like salmon and avocado, then roll and slice.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.instructions: Mash avocado on toasted bread. Season with salt.

recipes.title: Green Smoothie
recipes.instructions: Blend spinach, banana, apple, and water until smooth.

recipes.title: Butter Chicken
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken in butter with garlic, onion, tomato, cream, and spices.

recipes.title: Shrimp Tacos
recipes.instructions: Fill taco shells with shrimp, cabbage, avocado, and sour cream.

recipes.title: French Toast
recipes.instructions: Dip bread in egg and milk mixture. Fry until golden and serve with sugar or syrup.
